SELECT BOARD_YOUTUBE_SEQ.nextval AS ytbIdx FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BOARD_YOUTUBE( YTB_IDX, YTB_TITLE, YTB_URL, YTB_INFO, YTB_REGDATE, YTB_HIT, YTB_LIKE, YTB_CHANNEL_NAME, YTB_CHANNEL_URL, YTB_THUMBNAIL, MEM_ID, YTB_CHANNEL_THUMB, YTB_EMBED_URL) VALUES( #{ytbIdx}, #{ytbTitle}, #{ytbUrl}, #{ytbInfo}, SYSDATE, 0, 0, #{ytbChannelName}, #{ytbChannelUrl}, #{ytbThumbnail}, #{memId}, #{ytbChannelThumb}, #{ytbEmbedUrl} )

SELECT YTB_SUBSCRIBES_SEQ.nextval AS subIdx FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YTB_SUBSCRIBES( SUB_IDX, MEM_ID, YTB_CHANNEL_NAME) VALUES( #{subIdx}, #{memId}, #{ytbChannelName})

SELECT YTB_REPLY_SEQ.nextval AS reIdx FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YTB_REPLY( RE_IDX, MEM_ID, RE_CONTENT, RE_REG_DATE, RE_UPDATE_DATE, YTB_IDX ) VALUES( #{reIdx}, #{memId}, #{reContent}, SYSDATE, null, #{ytbIdx} )
